base_description: Black rectangular switch with red toggle.
part_description: The switch has a red toggle button, a black rectangular base, and white markings for on/off. The toggle is centrally positioned and slightly raised.
internal_interaction_description: The toggle button pivots on a central axis within the black base. When pressed, it connects or disconnects internal electrical contacts, changing the circuit state. The markings guide the user in operating the switch correctly.
external_interaction_description: The switch is designed to be mounted on a panel and interacts with electrical devices by opening or closing a circuit. Users manually toggle the switch to control power flow, indicated by the on/off markings.
